summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4425 for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 5 and 6, University Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue Northeast and 7th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 47th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52326, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
